Articles.Content:
Made with the ISA MapSat plugin

Minmus edited in Photoshop to more match the color of the Moon.
Minmus looks a bit off colour. And you should clean up those white lines around the Mun. But they are really good posters!

Minmus looks a bit off colour. And you should clean up those white lines around the Mun. But they are really good posters!

thanks.

I got Minmus as close as I could I know its a little off but it is close enough. I am getting a higher res map of the mun that will deal with those issues and will update when it is done.
